00028 static int credits = 256;
00029 module_param(credits, int, 0444);
00030 MODULE_PARM_DESC(credits, "# concurrent sends");
00031

00033 module_param(eager_credits, int, 0644);
00034 MODULE_PARM_DESC(eager_credits, "# eager buffers");

00037 module_param(peer_credits, int, 0444);
00038 MODULE_PARM_DESC(peer_credits, "# LNet peer credits");
00039 
00040 /* NB - we'll not actually limit sends to this, we just size the mailbox buffer
00041  * such that at most we'll have concurrent_sends * max_immediate messages
00042  * in the mailbox */
00043 static int concurrent_sends = 0;
00044 module_param(concurrent_sends, int, 0444);
00045 MODULE_PARM_DESC(concurrent_sends, "# concurrent HW sends to 1 peer");
00046 
00047 /* default for 2k nodes @ 16 peer credits */

00049 module_param(fma_cq_size, int, 0444);
00050 MODULE_PARM_DESC(fma_cq_size, "size of the completion queue");
00051 
00052 static int timeout = GNILND_BASE_TIMEOUT;
00053 /* can't change @ runtime because LNet gets NI data at startup from
00054  * this value */
00055 module_param(timeout, int, 0444);
00056 MODULE_PARM_DESC(timeout, "communications timeout (seconds)");
00057 
00058 /* time to wait between datagram timeout and sending of next dgram */
00059 static int min_reconnect_interval = GNILND_MIN_RECONNECT_TO;
00060 module_param(min_reconnect_interval, int, 0644);
00061 MODULE_PARM_DESC(min_reconnect_interval, "minimum connection retry interval (seconds)");
00062 
00063 /* if this goes longer than timeout, we'll timeout the TX before
00064  * the dgram */
00065 static int max_reconnect_interval = GNILND_MAX_RECONNECT_TO;
00066 module_param(max_reconnect_interval, int, 0644);
00067 MODULE_PARM_DESC(max_reconnect_interval, "maximum connection retry interval (seconds)");
00068

00205 kgn_tunables_t kgnilnd_tunables = {
00206         .kgn_min_reconnect_interval = &min_reconnect_interval,

00243         .kgn_thread_affinity        = &thread_affinity,
00244         .kgn_thread_safe            = &thread_safe,

00246         .kgn_max_purgatory          = &max_conn_purg
00247 };
00248 
00249 int
00250 kgnilnd_tunables_init()
00251 {
00252         int rc = 0;
00253 
00254         switch (*kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_checksum) {
00255         default:
00256                 CERROR("Invalid checksum module parameter: %d\n",
00257                        *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_checksum);
00258                 rc = -EINVAL;
00259                 GOTO(out, rc);
00260         case GNILND_CHECKSUM_OFF:
00261                 /* no checksumming */
00262                 break;
00263         case GNILND_CHECKSUM_SMSG_HEADER:
00264                 LCONSOLE_INFO("SMSG header only checksumming enabled\n");
00265                 break;
00266         case GNILND_CHECKSUM_SMSG:
00267                 LCONSOLE_INFO("SMSG checksumming enabled\n");
00268                 break;
00269         case GNILND_CHECKSUM_SMSG_BTE:
00270                 LCONSOLE_INFO("SMSG + BTE checksumming enabled\n");
00271                 break;
00272         }
00273 
00274         if (*kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_max_immediate > GNILND_MAX_IMMEDIATE) {
00275                 LCONSOLE_ERROR("kgnilnd module parameter 'max_immediate' too large %d > %d\n",
00276                 *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_max_immediate, GNILND_MAX_IMMEDIATE);
00277                 rc = -EINVAL;
00278                 GOTO(out, rc);
00279         }
00280 
00281         if (*kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_mbox_per_block < 1) {
00282                 *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_mbox_per_block = 1;
00283         }
00284 
00285         if (*kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_concurrent_sends == 0) {
00286                 *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_concurrent_sends = *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_peer_credits;
00287         } else if (*kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_concurrent_sends > *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_peer_credits) {
00288                 LCONSOLE_ERROR("kgnilnd parameter 'concurrent_sends' too large: %d > %d (peer_credits)\n",
00289                                *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_concurrent_sends, *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_peer_credits);
00290                 rc = -EINVAL;
00291         }
00292 out:
00293         return rc;
00294 }
